name: Epic Chain
description: What is the project about? Epic Chain, backed by Ripple, is rapidly expanding to become one of the fastest-growing RWA ecosystems in Web3, operating in over 150 countries. It is focused on building the world’s first RWA superstructure, aligning institutions and consumers across every major asset class. 1. Fanable is the flagship consumer RWA product native to Epic Chain ・Generating over $1,200,000 in annual on-chain fees. ・Rapidly becoming the leading RWA product in the consumer goods sector. 2. Epic is building an RWA superstructure ・Encompassing every sector that captures real-world asset value. ・Engaging the world’s leading institutions and consumers across every major asset class. 3. Epic bridges XRP to RWA products ・Epic is launching a series of products this quarter that connect XRP directly to major real-world economies. ・With Ripple as an investor in Epic, we remain committed to becoming the premier RWA product within the XRP economy. What's next for your project? Epic Chain is intensifying its focus on integrating Real World Assets (RWAs) into its blockchain ecosystem, aiming to bridge the gap between traditional finance and decentralized technology. This strategic direction seeks to unlock significant value by enabling the tokenization of tangible assets such as real estate, commodities, and intellectual property. By prioritizing RWA integration, Epic Chain aims to democratize access to traditionally illiquid assets, providing liquidity and efficiency in markets that have historically been fragmented. This approach not only enhances investment opportunities but also fosters a more inclusive financial ecosystem. In alignment with this vision, Epic Chain is actively integrating with the XRPLedger EVM sidechain. This expansion into the XRP ecosystem marks a significant step in the platform’s evolution, enabling Epic to build future products natively on XRP infrastructure. By leveraging the speed, scalability, and global reach of XRPLedger, Epic Chain is positioned to deliver cutting-edge decentralized finance solutions that are interoperable, secure, and widely accessible. As blockchain technology continues to evolve, Epic Chain’s commitment to RWAs, alongside its expansion into the XRPLedger ecosystem, underscores its dedication to driving real-world utility and accelerating the adoption of decentralized finance. This dual focus positions Epic Chain at the forefront of both RWA innovation and cross-chain interoperability.
